data.text: Very good resort,room was clean and tidy Abdul did a great job providing us with a different animal ( folded towel) every day. Good selection of pools to swim in. 3 Ala Cart restaurants on sit and very good restaurants to dine breakfast lunch and evening meals. Selection of food was very good, service was also very good, best waiter was Islam supervised by Amr. Entertainment was good and bars were busy but staff provided good table service. Great cocktails and beers.
data.title: All round good holiday

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valuable  Guest ,

Thank you very much for your comments about your recent stay at Jaz Mirabel Resort. It was a pleasure to read your feedback and share it with the entire team to motivate them to continue their hard work.
Thank you again and we look forward to welcoming you again in the near future.
Follow us on the Jaz Mirabel Resort Facebook page.
Thank you and all the best,
Ibrahim Halil Tasoyan
Resort General Manager

data.text:
We stayed at the Jaz Mirabel with the family, everything went well, cleanliness, good food and courtesy are the strong points of the structure to which are added the facilities and the
sea. A special thanks to those who took care of our room 2323 with such professionalism and kindness towards our two little girls, dear Gamal who with his creations made cleaning our room an artistic experienceðŸ˜Š we give maximum marks for everything
hotel staff who made us feel good and who always showed kindness and helpfulnessðŸ˜Ž
data.title: Thanks Gamal from room 2323

data.text:
I am writing this to express the wonderful stay that my parents had at this hotel. 
The stay was for two weeks.
They stayed as part of a Tui holiday package.
They had a wonderful suite/ room that was kept spotless, and they particularly want to thank Mohammed for the way he looked after them and cleaned their room daily. 
He was always upbeat, smiling, and willing to help in any way that he could. They are extremely greatful to him.
Generally all staff were polite, professional and were always eager to make your stay special.
The hotel has access to a private beach and also has numerous pools. Some of which were heated and all were spotlessly clean and were situated within beautiful and well maintained gardens.
The whole hotel offered a very relaxing ambience.
There was also plenty of day and evening entertainment with a really motivated team that allowed those who wanted to get involved in all activities.
Upon leaving we were extremely grateful for an extended check out time which allowed us to use the facilities and freshen up before our long flight home.
A particular mention needs to go to the staff who made our holiday so memorable, especially at a time when they were themselves participating in Ramadan. 
Their hard work during what can be a challenging time was greatly appreciated.
This hotel is thoroughly recommended for a stay in the Nabqq Area.
There are shuttle buses (at a small cost) to other areas, including Soho Square.
data.title: Magical Mirabel Stay

data.text: The team at the hotel couldnâ€™t do enough and the resort was exceptional and very clean.  Beautiful beach with access to swim to the coral reefs.  The selection of food was wonderful and we loved the themed restaurants.  Pools are warm and offer child friendly and adult pools too.  The Spa was the best and very well priced.
data.title: Fantastic holiday with incredible service.
